description:
iML1515
Genome-scale metabolic model of Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

Contains:
1515 genes + 1 pseudo gene for spontaneous reactions
1877 metabolites
2712 reactions

Publication:
Monk, J. M., Lloyd, C. J., Brunk, E., Mih, N., Sastry, A., King, Z., Takeuchi, R., Nomura, W., Zhang, Z., Mori, H., Feist, A. M., & Palsson, B. O. (2017). iML1515, a knowledgebase that computes Escherichia coli traits. Nature biotechnology, 35(10), 904–908. https://doi.org/10.1038/nbt.3956

-----------------------------------
changes to original model:
glucose uptake limit increased to 20
added variances from anaerobic fermentation of E. coli MG1655 taken from Table 1 of: Monk JM, Koza A, Campodonico MA, Machado D, Seoane JM, Palsson BO, Herrgård MJ, Feist AM. Multi-omics Quantification of Species Variation of Escherichia coli Links Molecular Features with Strain Phenotypes. Cell Syst. 2016 Sep 28;3(3):238-251.e12.
